name: Beard Potato
description:
You've started working as a part-time Beard Potato shaver!

All you do is simple:

  • Drag on the surface of the potato to shave its hair.
  • Shave against the hair growth.
  • When your shaver gets jammed with hair, knock-knock to unclog it.
  • If you stimulate the potato sprouts or take too much time shaving, the Beard Potato will be alerted and retract its hair.
